d_roman_pagan = {
	color={ 155 155 235 }
	color2={ 220 220 0 }
	
	capital = 222
	
	#title = "IMPERATOR"
	#title_female = "IMPERATRIX"

	title = "PONTIFEX_MAXIMUS"
	#foa = "PONTIFEX_MAXIMUS_FOA"
	short_name = yes
	
	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = roman_pagan_reformed
	
	religion = roman_pagan_reformed
	
	primary = no
	
	#dignity = 10 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	
	dynasty_title_names = no 	# Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.
	
	allow = {
		always = no		# Only created through special decision
	}
}

d_pict_pagan = {
	color={ 122 165 70 }
	color2={ 220 220 0 }
	
	capital = 252
	
	title = "ARCH_DRUID"
	title_female = "ARCH_DRUIDESS"
	foa = "ARCH_DRUID_FOA"
	
	short_name = yes
	
	# Always exists
	landless = yes

	allow = {
		religion = pict_pagan_reformed
		num_of_holy_sites = 3
		piety = 500
		has_religion_feature = religion_temporal_head
	}
	
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = pict_pagan_reformed
	
	religion = pict_pagan_reformed
	
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = no
	
	dynasty_title_names = no 	# Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.
}

	k_belgae = {
		color={ 100 160 130 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		title_prefix = "BRITISH_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		culture = briton
		
		capital = 6 # Venta
		
		assimilate = no
		
		allow = {
			culture_group = celtic
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					trait = northaugustus
					top_liege = { trait = northaugustus }
				}
			}
			OR = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = gwinntguic_tooltip
					has_global_flag = belgae_created
				}
				AND = {
					lower_tier_than = KING
					has_landed_title = d_the_belgae
					completely_controls = c_venta
					OR = {
						completely_controls = c_sorviodunum
						completely_controls = c_calleva
						completely_controls = c_regentium
					}
					independent = yes
					prestige = 1000
					age = 20
				}
			}
		}
	}

			culture_group = celtic
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					trait = northaugustus

				}
			}
			NOT = { has_landed_title = k_gwynedd }
			OR = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = henis_wyren_tooltip
					has_global_flag = henis_wyren_created
				}
				AND = {
					lower_tier_than = KING
					primary_title = {
						OR = {
							title = d_osmaeliog
							title = d_arfon
						}
					}
					completely_controls = d_osmaeliog
					completely_controls = c_arfon
					independent = yes
					prestige = 1000
					age = 20
				}
			}
		}

	k_glevum = {
		color={ 152 129 71 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		culture = romanobritish
		
		capital = 20 # Glevum
		
		title_prefix = "BRITISH_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		allow = {
			culture_group = celtic
			NOR = {
				trait = northaugustus
				top_liege = { trait = northaugustus }
			}
			OR = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = glevum_tooltip
					has_global_flag = glevum_created
				}
				AND = {
					lower_tier_than = KING
					has_landed_title = d_centgwent
					has_landed_title = d_corinium
					has_landed_title = d_baddon
					independent = yes
					prestige = 1000
					age = 20
				}
			}
			completely_controls = c_glevum
		}
		
		assimilate = no
	}

	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = {  
			text = britannia_require_tooltip
			hidden_tooltip = { always = no }
		}
	}
}

	allow = {
		tier = KING
		OR = {
			culture = pictish
			culture = gaelic
			culture = oldirish
		}
		AND = {
			has_landed_title = k_caledonia
			OR = {
				has_landed_title = k_dalriada
				completely_controls_region = world_caledonia_dalriada
			}
		}
		completely_controls = c_din_eidyn
		completely_controls = c_altclut
		completely_controls = c_eskdale
		age = 25
		prestige = 1250
		num_of_count_titles_in_realm = 50
		realm_martial = 25
		realm_diplomacy = 25
		realm_stewardship = 25
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
	}

# AENGLALAND
	
e_aengland = {

	color={ 160 40 40 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
	
	capital = 6 # Venta/Winchester
	assimilate = no
	
	culture = anglosaxon
	
	title = "BRETWALDA"
	title_prefix = "CYNERICE_OF"
	
	k_sussex = {
		color={ 100 90 130 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		culture = oldsaxon
		
		capital = 356 # Regentium/Cissaceaster
		assimilate = no

		dignity = 3
		
		title_prefix = "SAXON_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		allow = {
			are_dejure_changes_allowed_trigger = yes
			is_ingvaeonic_culture_trigger = yes
			completely_controls = c_regentium
			OR = {
				lower_tier_than = KING
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = "Has previously been formed"
					FROM = {
						any_previous_holder = {
							always = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

							completely_controls = d_wixna
							OR = {

								NOT = { has_global_flag = aelle_ruling_anglia }

						}
					}
				}

					NOT = { 
						AND = {
							ai = yes
							has_landed_title = k_anglia
							NOT = { year = 570 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

			prestige = 250
			change_diplomacy = 1
			change_martial = 1
		}
	}

e_gaul = {		# Imperium Galliarum
	color={ 180 70 130 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }

	culture = romanogallic
	short_name = yes
	assimilate = no
	
	hebrew = "Tzar'fat"
	french = "Gaulle"
	occitan = "Gaulle"
	arpitan = "Gaulle"
	
	creation_requires_capital = no
	
	title = "IMPERATOR"
	title_female = "IMPERATRIX"
	purple_born_heirs = yes
	dynasty_title_names = no
	
	dignity = 1000
	
	allow = {
		OR = {
			culture_group = imperiale
			culture = romanobritish
		}
		age = 20
		is_female = no
		realm_size = 350
		prestige = 2000
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
		tier = KING
		NOT = { trait = slow }
		NOT = { trait = dwarf }
		NOT = { trait = leper }
		NOT = { trait = blinded }
		NOT = { trait = imbecile }
		NOT = { trait = eunuch }
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = senate_restored_tooltip
			hidden_tooltip = { any_demesne_title = { has_title_flag = senate_restored_title } }
		}
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = {
				e_visigoths = { has_holder = yes }
			}
			e_visigoths = { has_holder = no }
		}
	}

	# SUB-ROMAN KINGDOMS IN GAUL
	
	k_broceliande = {
		color={ 86 191 151 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		culture = armorican

		allow = {
			culture_group = celtic
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					trait = northaugustus
					top_liege = { trait = northaugustus }
				}
			}
			OR = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = broceliande_tooltip
					NOT = { has_global_flag = broceliande_renamed }
				}
				AND = {
					completely_controls = c_vannes
					completely_controls = c_quimper
					completely_controls = c_broceliande
					completely_controls = c_rennes
				}
			}
		}
		
		title_prefix = "BRITISH_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		capital = 205 # Darioritum/Vannes
		assimilate = no		
	}
	k_benoic = {
		color={ 165 165 165 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		culture = armorican

		allow = {
			culture_group = celtic
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					trait = northaugustus
					top_liege = { trait = northaugustus }
				}
			}
			OR = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = benoic_tooltip_1
					NOT = { has_global_flag = benoic_renamed }
					NOT = { has_global_flag = benoic_destroyed }
				}
				AND = {
					completely_controls = c_ynys_trebes
					completely_controls = c_constantia
					completely_controls = c_rennes
				}
			}
			OR = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = benoic_tooltip_2
					NOT = { has_global_flag = benoic_destroyed }
				}
				culture = armorican
			}
		}
		
		title_prefix = "BRITISH_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		capital = 78 # Ynys Trebes
		assimilate = no
		
	}

			is_roman_culture_trigger = yes

			NOT = { tier = EMPEROR }

				completely_controls = c_reims
				completely_controls = c_tours
				completely_controls = c_agedincum
				completely_controls = c_rotomagus
				completely_controls = c_treverorum
				completely_controls = c_soissons
			}
			realm_size = 70
		}
	}
		
	k_burgundy = {
		color={ 132 111 176 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 222	# Lugdunum / Lyon
		
		title_prefix = "GAUL_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		culture = burgundian
		assimilate = no
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					culture = burgundian
					age = 25
					prestige = 1000
					independent = yes
					realm_size = 35
				}
				AND = {
					is_frankish_culture_trigger = yes
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = burgundy_subjugated
						has_global_flag = lyon_created
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { NOT = { k_burgundy = { has_title_flag = romanized_germanic_empire_created_from_title } } }
		}
		
		oldfrankish = "Burgundy"
		frankish = "Burgundy"

	k_visigoths = {
		color={ 132 146 108 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 740  # Tolosa
		
		title_prefix = "GAUL_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		culture = visigoth
		assimilate = no
		
		allow = {
			culture = visigoth
			age = 25
			prestige = 1000
			independent = yes
			realm_size = 35
			hidden_tooltip = { NOT = { k_visigoths = { has_title_flag = romanized_germanic_empire_created_from_title } } }
		}
	}
	
	gain_effect = {
		change_diplomacy = 1
		change_martial = 1
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					primary_title = { NOT = { has_law = ze_administration_laws_2 } }
				}
				primary_title = {
					add_law = { 
						law = ze_administration_laws_2 
						cooldown = no 
						opinion_effect = no 
					}
				}
			}
			e_gaul = {
				add_law = { 
					law = succ_byzantine_elective
					cooldown = no 
					opinion_effect = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
	
e_franks = {		# Francia

	color={ 200 165 50 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
	
	capital = 82 # Lutetia

	culture = oldfrankish
	
	oldfrankish = "Frankaríki"
	frankish = "Frankaríki"
	dutch = "Frankeríki"
	franconian = "Frankeríhhi"
	french = "France"
#	norman = "France"
	occitan = "França"
	arpitan = "France"
	hebrew = "Tzar'fat"
	
	assimilate = no
	
	title_prefix = "EMPIRE_OF_GAUL"
	
	title = "FRANKLANDKING"
	title_female = "FRANKLANDKING_female"
	
	allow = {
		are_dejure_changes_allowed_trigger = yes
		is_frankish_culture_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_religion_feature = religion_no_leader
			AND = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = has_religious_head
					religion_head = {
						always = yes
					}
				}
				religion_head = {
					OR = {
						top_liege = { character = ROOT }
						opinion = {
							who = ROOT
							value = 60
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		is_female = no
		age = 25
		prisoner = no
		independent = yes
		prestige = 3000
		OR = {
			piety = 750
			has_character_modifier = true_christian_knight
			AND = {
				trait = zealous
				trait = diligent
				trait = ambitious
			}
		}
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
		NOT = { trait = imbecile }
		completely_controls_region = custom_roman_soissons_area
		completely_controls_region = custom_frankish_area
		realm_size = 450
		e_western_roman_empire = { has_holder = no }
	}
	
	gain_effect = {
		prestige = 500
		piety = 100
		change_diplomacy = 1
	}
}
	
e_visigoths = {		# Empire Title for Romanized Germanics
	color={ 155 105 115 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
	
	capital = 740  # Tolosa

	culture = visigoth
	short_name = yes
	assimilate = no
	
	creation_requires_capital = no
	
	title = "IMPERATOR"
	title_female = "IMPERATRIX"
	
	allow = {
		has_global_flag = romanized_germanic_empire_formed
		OR = {
			is_romanized_germanic_trigger = yes
			culture = alan
		}
		age = 20
		is_female = no
		realm_size = 350
		prestige = 2000
		piety = 500
		tier = KING
		NOR = { 
			is_incapable = yes
			trait = slow
			trait = dwarf
			trait = leper
			trait = blinded
			trait = imbecile
			trait = eunuch
		}
	}
}

# GERMANIA

e_germania = {				# High Kingdom of Germania
	color={ 108 56 57 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }	
	capital = 458 # Sturmaria (temporary, please change)
	
	culture = oldsaxon # (temporary, please change)
	
	#short_name = yes
	assimilate = no
	
	anglosaxon = "Þéodiscaland"
	angle = "Þéodiscaland"
	oldsaxon = "Þéodiscaland"
	saxon = "Þiudiskóland"
	jute = "Þéodiscaland"
	oldfrisian = "Þéodiscaland"
	frisian = "Þióskalond"
	dane = "Þýðiskraland"
	norse_gael = "Þýðiskraland"
	proto_norse = "Þiudiskölanda"
	oldfrankish = "Þéodiskaland"
	frankish = "Þéodiskaland"
	dutch = "Þiudisklant"
	franconian = "Diutisklant"
	thuringian = "Diutiskland"
	oldthuringian = "Þiutiskoland"
	alemannic = "Diutisklant"
	oldalemannic = "Þiutiskoland"
	bavarian = "Diutisklant"
	oldbavarian = "Þiutiskoland"
	french = "Germainie"
	occitan = "Germanha"
	arpitan = "Germania"
	hebrew = "Ashkenaz"
	
	creation_requires_capital = no
	
	dynasty_title_names = no
	
	allow = {
		culture_group = germanic
		is_romanized_germanic_trigger = no
		age = 25
		prestige = 1250
		tier = KING
		num_of_count_titles_in_realm = 100
		diplomacy = 10
		martial = 12
		realm_martial = 25
		realm_diplomacy = 25
		realm_stewardship = 25
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = franconia_expanded }
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_30_provinces_in_alemannia_tooltip
				hidden_tooltip = {
					any_realm_province = {
						count = 30
						region = custom_alemannia
					}
				}
			}
		}
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = {
				has_global_flag = franconia_expanded
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_10_provinces_in_swabia_tooltip
				hidden_tooltip = {
					any_realm_province = {
						count = 10
						region = custom_swabia
					}
				}
			}
		}
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = franconia_expanded }
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_6_provinces_in_hesse_tooltip
				hidden_tooltip = {
					any_realm_province = {
						count = 6
						region = world_hesse
					}
				}
			}
		}
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = {
				has_global_flag = franconia_expanded
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_27_provinces_in_franconia_tooltip
				hidden_tooltip = {
					any_realm_province = {
						count = 27
						region = custom_franconia
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = controls_12_provinces_in_ripuaria_tooltip
			hidden_tooltip = {
				any_realm_province = {
					count = 12
					region = custom_ripuaria
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = controls_34_provinces_in_saxony_and_hamaland_salland_tooltip
			hidden_tooltip = {
				any_realm_province = {
					count = 34
					OR = {
						region = world_germania_saxony
						region = world_hamaland_salland
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = controls_15_provinces_in_frisia_tooltip
			hidden_tooltip = {
				any_realm_province = {
					count = 15
					region = custom_frisia
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	k_saxony = {			# Kingdom of Saxony
		color={ 72 11 32 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 458	# Sturmaria
		assimilate = no

		culture = oldsaxon
		
		dynasty_title_names = no
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					age = 20
					OR = {
						culture = oldsaxon
						culture = saxon
					}
					independent = yes
					prestige = 1500
					num_of_count_titles_in_realm = 15
				}
				AND = {
					is_frankish_culture_trigger = yes
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = saxony_subjugated_tooltip
						has_global_flag = saxony_subjugated
					}
				}
				AND = {
					culture_group = germanic
					top_liege = { 
						culture_group = germanic
						tier = EMPEROR
					}
				}
			}	
			conditional_tooltip = {
				trigger = {
					is_roman_emperor_trigger = yes
				}
				is_roman_emperor_trigger = no
			}
		}

	k_thuringia = {
		color={ 166 115 110 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 230  # Metz
		
		title_prefix = "GAUL_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		culture = oldthuringian
		assimilate = no
		creation_requires_capital = no
		
		allow = {
			age = 20
			OR = {
				culture = oldthuringian
				culture = thuringian
			}
			prestige = 1000
			independent = yes
			OR = {
				AND = {
					completely_controls = c_metz
					completely_controls = c_moyen
					completely_controls = c_calmontium
					completely_controls = c_stadunensis
					completely_controls = c_verdun
				}
				num_of_count_titles_in_realm = 15
			}
		}
	}
	
	k_frisia = {
		color={ 186 167 68 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 166	# Utrecht/Traiectum
		
		# title_prefix = "GAUL_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		culture = oldfrisian
		assimilate = no
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					age = 20
					OR = {
						is_ingvaeonic_culture_trigger = yes
						AND = {
							is_north_germanic_trigger = yes
							lower_tier_than = KING
							capital_scope = { region = custom_frisia }
						}
					}
					independent = yes
					prestige = 1500
					num_of_count_titles_in_realm = 15
				}
				AND = {
					is_frankish_culture_trigger = yes
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = frisia_subjugated_tooltip
						has_global_flag = frisia_subjugated
					}
				}
				AND = {
					culture_group = germanic
					top_liege = { 
						culture_group = germanic
						tier = EMPEROR
					}
				}
			}	
			conditional_tooltip = {
				trigger = {
					is_roman_emperor_trigger = yes
				}
				is_roman_emperor_trigger = no
			}
		}

	k_alemannia = {
		color={ 176 173 173 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 1096	# Albuinsbaar
		
		title_prefix = "GAUL_KINGDOM_OF"
		
		culture = oldalemannic
		assimilate = no
		#creation_requires_capital = no
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					age = 20
					OR = {
						culture = oldalemannic
						culture = alemannic
					}
					independent = yes
					prestige = 1500
					num_of_count_titles_in_realm = 15
				}
				AND = {
					is_frankish_culture_trigger = yes
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = alemannia_subjugated_tooltip
						has_global_flag = alemannia_subjugated
					}
				}
				AND = {
					culture_group = germanic
					top_liege = { 
						culture_group = germanic
						tier = EMPEROR
					}
				}
			}	
			conditional_tooltip = {
				trigger = {
					is_roman_emperor_trigger = yes
				}
				is_roman_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				OR = {
					ai = no
					is_frankish_culture_trigger = no
					year = 700
				}
			}
		}

	k_franconia = {
		color = { 150 140 90 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 1072		# Untarrheingau
		
		culture = oldfrankish
		
		assimilate = no
		
		allow = {
			has_global_flag = franconia_created
			OR = {
				is_frankish_culture_trigger = yes
				AND = {
					culture_group = germanic
					top_liege = { 
						culture_group = germanic
						tier = EMPEROR
					}
				}
			}
			conditional_tooltip = {
				trigger = {
					is_roman_emperor_trigger = yes
				}
				is_roman_emperor_trigger = no
			}
		}
	}
}

			independent = yes
			realm_size = 25
			hidden_tooltip = { NOT = { k_alans = { has_title_flag = romanized_germanic_empire_created_from_title } } }
		}
	}

		martial = 12

		completely_controls = c_aginnum

			trait = slow
			trait = dwarf
			trait = leper
			trait = blinded
			trait = imbecile
			trait = eunuch
			trait = incapable

	}

# ROMAN TITLES IN BRITAIN

e_roman_britannia = {
	color={ 210 90 45 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
	
	culture = roman
	
	capital = 47 # Londinium
	short_name = yes
	assimilate = no
	
	french = "Britaigne"
#	norman = "Britaine"
	occitan = "Bretanha"
	arpitan = "Bretagne"
	hebrew = "Bretanyah"
	
	creation_requires_capital = no
	
	title = "IMPERATOR"
	title_female = "IMPERATRIX"
	purple_born_heirs = yes
	dynasty_title_names = no
	
	dignity = 1000
	
	allow = {
		is_roman_culture_trigger = yes
		age = 20
		is_female = no
		realm_size = 150
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
		custom_tooltip = {  
			text = senate_restored_tooltip
			hidden_tooltip = { any_demesne_title = { has_title_flag = senate_restored_title } }
		}
		tier = KING
		OR = {
			has_landed_title = k_maxima_cesariensis
			has_landed_title = k_flavia_cesariensis
			has_landed_title = k_britannia_prima
			has_landed_title = k_britannia_secunda
			has_landed_title = k_valentia
		}
		NOT = { trait = slow }
		NOT = { trait = dwarf }
		NOT = { trait = leper }
		NOT = { trait = blinded }
		NOT = { trait = imbecile }
		NOT = { trait = eunuch }
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
	}

	k_britannia_prima = {
		# color={ 110 150 205 }
		# color = { 80 180 220 }
		color = { 225 125 85 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		culture = roman
		
		capital = 11 # Corinium
		dignity = 8
		
		assimilate = no
		
		title = "GOVERNOR"
		title_female = "DOMINA"
		title_prefix = "PROVINCE_OF"
		purple_born_heirs = yes
		
		allow = {
			completely_controls = c_corinium
			OR = {
				trait = northaugustus
				culture_group = imperiale
				AND = {
					top_liege = { trait = northaugustus }
					culture = romanobritish
				}
			}
			briton_king_roman_province_creation_block_trigger = yes
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = calc_true_if_5_tooltip
				calc_true_if = {
					amount = 5
					completely_controls = c_glevum
					completely_controls = c_burrium
					completely_controls = c_isca_siluria
					completely_controls = c_moridunum
					completely_controls = c_viroconium	
					completely_controls = c_arfon
					completely_controls = c_calleva
					completely_controls = c_venta
					completely_controls = c_durnovaria
					completely_controls = c_isca_dumnonia
				}
			}
			tooltip = {
				calc_true_if = {
					amount = 5
					completely_controls = c_glevum
					completely_controls = c_burrium
					completely_controls = c_isca_siluria
					completely_controls = c_moridunum
					completely_controls = c_viroconium	
					completely_controls = c_arfon
					completely_controls = c_calleva
					completely_controls = c_venta
					completely_controls = c_durnovaria
					completely_controls = c_isca_dumnonia
				}
			}
		}
		
		gain_effect = {
			change_diplomacy = 1
			hidden_tooltip = {
				k_britannia_prima = {
					gender_succ = agnatic
				}
			}
		}
	}
	k_britannia_secunda = {
		# color={ 140 205 120 }
		color={ 230 100 30 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		culture = roman
		
		capital = 37 # Eburacum
		dignity = 8
		
		assimilate = no
		
		title = "GOVERNOR"
		title_female = "DOMINA"
		title_prefix = "PROVINCE_OF"
		purple_born_heirs = yes
		
		allow = {
			completely_controls = c_eburacum
			OR = {
				trait = northaugustus
				culture_group = imperiale
				AND = {
					top_liege = { trait = northaugustus }
					culture = romanobritish
				}
			}
			briton_king_roman_province_creation_block_trigger = yes
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = calc_true_if_3_tooltip
				calc_true_if = {
					amount = 3
					completely_controls = c_iserium
					completely_controls = c_old_tyne
					completely_controls = c_cambodunum
					completely_controls = c_hibernicum
					completely_controls = c_eden
					completely_controls = c_luguvallum
				}
			}
			tooltip = {
				calc_true_if = {
					amount = 3
					completely_controls = c_iserium
					completely_controls = c_old_tyne
					completely_controls = c_cambodunum
					completely_controls = c_hibernicum
					completely_controls = c_eden
					completely_controls = c_luguvallum
				}
			}
		}
		
		gain_effect = {

					completely_controls = c_ui_neill
					completely_controls = c_mide
					completely_controls = c_tethbae

					gender_succ = agnatic
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	gain_effect = {
		change_diplomacy = 1
		change_martial = 1
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					primary_title = { NOT = { has_law = ze_administration_laws_2 } }
				}
				primary_title = {
					add_law = { 
						law = ze_administration_laws_2 
						cooldown = no 
						opinion_effect = no 
					}
				}
			}
			e_roman_britannia = {
				add_law = { 
					law = succ_byzantine_elective
					cooldown = no 
					opinion_effect = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character_modifier = maxima_caesariensis_decaying_realm }
			remove_character_modifier = maxima_caesariensis_decaying_realm
		}
	}
}

# OTHER BRITISH AND IRISH KINGDOMS in BRITAIN

e_cymru = {			# CYMRU
	color={ 36 111 73 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
	culture = briton
	
	capital = 35 # Caer Gei
	assimilate = no
	
	allow = {
		hidden_tooltip = { has_global_flag = offa_dyke_created }
		tier = KING
		culture = briton
		is_female = no
		age = 20
		prestige = 750
		OR = {
			has_landed_title = k_dumnonia
			has_landed_title = k_gwent
			has_landed_title = k_powys
			has_landed_title = k_siluria
			has_landed_title = k_gwynedd
			has_landed_title = k_icenia
			has_landed_title = k_cantuaria
			has_landed_title = k_belgae
			has_landed_title = k_kernow
			has_landed_title = k_glevum
			has_landed_title = k_henis_wyren
			has_landed_title = k_demetia
		}
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
	}
}	

			d_arthur_company = {
				color={ 36 111 73 }
				color2={ 255 255 255 }
				
				culture = romanobritish
				
				landless = yes
				
				capital = 78 # Ynys Trebes
				
				title = "COMMANDER"
				
				allow = {
					always = no
				}
			}

# OTHER ARMORICAN/BRETON TITLES

e_armorica = {
	color={ 110 168 128 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }

	culture = armorican
	
	capital = 205 # Darioritum/Vannes
	assimilate = no
	
	title_prefix = "HIGH_KINGDOM_OF"
	
	allow = {
		tier = KING
		has_landed_title = k_broceliande
		OR = {
			culture = armorican
			culture = breton
		}
		is_female = no
		age = 20
		prestige = 1500
		realm_size = 60
		diplomacy = 15
		martial = 12
		NOR = { 
			trait = slow
			trait = dwarf
			trait = leper
			trait = blinded
			trait = imbecile
			trait = eunuch
			trait = incapable 
		}
	}
}

		d_retz = {
			color={ 100 130 55 }
			color2={ 255 255 255 }
			
			culture = armorican
			
			capital = 525 # Ratiatum
			
			allow = {
				culture_group = celtic
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						trait = northaugustus
						top_liege = { trait = northaugustus }
					}
				}
				OR = {
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = retz_tooltip
						has_global_flag = retz_created
					}
					AND = {
						has_landed_title = k_broceliande
						completely_controls = c_ratiatum
						completely_controls = c_vetraria
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		d_etre_daou_vor = {
			color={ 130 160 80 }
			color2={ 255 255 255 }
			
			culture = armorican
			
			capital = 549 # Combaristum
			
			allow = {
				culture_group = celtic
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						trait = northaugustus
						top_liege = { trait = northaugustus }
					}
				}
				OR = {
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = etre_daou_vor_tooltip
						has_global_flag = etre_daou_vor_created
					}
					AND = {
						has_landed_title = k_broceliande
						completely_controls = c_combaristum
						completely_controls = c_meduana
					}
				}
			}
		}

	# color={ 12 115 170 }
	color={ 12 80 20 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
	
	capital = 145 # Hill of Tara
	
	culture = oldirish
	
	oldirish = "Éire"
	gaelic = "Éire"
	pictish = "Eirinn"
	briton = "Iwerddon"
	
	assimilate = no
	
	dynasty_title_names = no
	
	allow = {
		tier = KING
		OR = { 
			culture = oldirish
			culture = gaelic
		}
		num_of_count_titles_in_realm = 80
		is_female = no
		age = 25
		prestige = 1000
		realm_diplomacy = 30
		realm_martial = 30
		realm_stewardship = 30
		ruled_years = 10
		OR = {
			trait = authoritative
			trait = strong
			trait = war_hero
			trait = master_warrior
			trait = brilliant_strategist
			trait = inspiring_leader
			trait = grey_eminence
			trait = ambitious
			prestige = 2000
			ruled_years = 15
			AND = {
				diplomacy = 18
				martial = 18
			}
		}
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
	}
	
	gain_effect = {
		change_diplomacy = 1
		change_martial = 1
	}

e_scandinavia = {
	color={ 80 160 200 }
	color2={ 255 255 0 }
	
	culture = dane
	
	dynasty_title_names = no
	assimilate = no
	
	capital = 845 # Vasksala/Uppsala

	gain_effect = {
		change_diplomacy = 1
		change_martial = 1
	}
	
	allow = {
		has_global_flag = scandinavia_created
		is_north_germanic_trigger = yes
		age = 25
		prestige = 1500
		num_of_count_titles_in_realm = 100
		realm_martial = 25
		realm_diplomacy = 25
		realm_stewardship = 25
		NOT = { trait = incapable }
	}
}

# ROMAN TITLES IN IRELAND

		color={ 97 156 121 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 134		# Regia
				
		culture = romanobritish
		
		creation_requires_capital = yes
		
		assimilate = no
		
		title_prefix = "CONSULAR_PROVINCE_OF"
		title = "CONSUL"
		title_female = "REGINA_CONSULARIS"
		
		allow = {
			always = no
		}
		
		
	}

# PAPAL LEGATE in BRITANNIA

	k_nuncio_britanniae = {
		color={ 200 200 165 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		title = "NUNCIO"
		foa = "NUNCIO_FOA"
		
		short_name = yes
		
		dignity = 100 
		
		capital = 111 	# Armagh
		
		creation_requires_capital = no
		
		# Always exists
		landless = yes
		
		# Controls a religion
		controls_religion = catholic
		
		religion = catholic
		culture = roman
		
		# Cannot be held as a secondary title
		primary = yes
		
		dynasty_title_names = no
		location_ruler_title = yes
		
		# Regnal names
		male_names = {
			Gregorius Benedictus Leo Bonifacius Adrianus
			Celestinus Martinus Honorius Callixtus Pelagius Adeodatus
			Agapetus Gelasius Anicetus
			Simplicius Silverius Vigilius Severinus Constantine Romanus
			Æmilius Albanus Ambrosinus Antoninus Attilius Aulus Aurelius
			Cassianus Cassius Cato Cornelius Domitianus Fabianus Germanus
			Horatius Iulianus Longinus Marianus Maximianus Maximus Octavianus
			Regulus Romolus Rufus
			Secundus Septimus Severus Sextus Tacitus Valerianus Vespasianus
		}
	}

# END PAPAL LEGATE in BRITANNIA

### MERCENARIES ###

		d_cohors_cornoviorum = {
			color={ 110 110 160 }
			color2={ 255 255 255 }
			
			capital = 41 # Old Tyne
			
			name_tier = count
			
			# Hire Trigger
			allow = {
				conditional_tooltip = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							is_alternate_start = yes
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_hellenic_group_religion_trigger = yes
						religion_group = pagan_group
						religion_group = christian
					}
					NOT = {
						culture = pictish
						culture = oldirish
						is_ingvaeonic_culture_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
			
			religion = roman_pagan
			culture = romanobritish
			
			dynasty_title_names = no
			mercenary = yes
			used_for_dynasty_names = no
			
			title = "LEGATUS"
			foa = "legatus_foa"

			landless = yes
			primary = yes
			# independent = yes

			mercenary_type = d_cohors_cornoviorum_composition
		}

		d_warriors_of_britain = {
			color={ 113 175 137 }
			color2={ 255 255 255 }
					
			capital = 2 # Lindinis
			
			# Hire Trigger
			allow = {
				conditional_tooltip = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							is_alternate_start = yes
						}
					}
					OR = {
						culture = briton
						culture = romanobritish
					}
					OR = {
						has_landed_title = e_britannia						# High Kings of Britannia
						has_landed_title = e_cymru						# High Kings of Cymru
						has_landed_title = d_warriors_of_britain				# Protectors of the Brotherhood
						AND = {										# Celtic Kings defending against non-celtic invaders
							tier = king
							war = yes
							any_war = {
								defender = { character = ROOT }
								attacker = {
									NOT = { culture_group = celtic }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			religion = briton_pagan
			culture = romanobritish
			
			dynasty_title_names = no
			mercenary = yes
			used_for_dynasty_names = no
			
			
			title = "PROTECTOR"
			title_female = "MAIDEN"
			foa = "CAPTAIN_FOA"

			landless = yes
			primary = yes
			# independent = yes

			mercenary_type = d_warriors_of_britain_composition
		}
		d_brotherhood_horsemen = {
			color={ 200 200 200 }
			color2={ 255 255 255 }
			
			capital = 2 # Lindinis
			
			name_tier = count
			
			# Hire Trigger
			allow = {
				conditional_tooltip = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							is_alternate_start = yes
						}
					}
					OR = {
						character = 3
						AND = {
							year = 500
							NOT = {
								any_playable_ruler = {
									character = 3
									is_alive = yes
								}
							}
							OR = {
								culture = briton
								culture = romanobritish
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

							is_alternate_start = yes
						}
					}
					OR = {
						culture_group = basque
						culture = romanoaquitanian
					}
				}
			}
			
			culture = vasconian
			#religion = vasconic_pagan
			
			dynasty_title_names = no
			mercenary = yes
			used_for_dynasty_names = no

			title = "CAPTAIN"
			foa = "CAPTAIN_FOA"

			landless = yes
			primary = yes
			independent = yes

			mercenary_type = d_vasconic_spearsmen_composition

			strength_growth_per_century = 0.2
		}

### FLEETS ###
	
		d_irish_corsairs = {
			color={ 60 40 40 }
			color2={ 255 255 255 }

			capital = 105 # Ui Liathain
			
			# Hire Trigger
			allow = {
				conditional_tooltip = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							is_alternate_start = yes
						}
					}
					OR = {
						religion_group = pagan_group
						religion_group = christian
					}
					OR = {
						culture_group = celtic
						culture_group = imperiale
					}
				}
			}
			
			religion = gael_pagan
			culture = oldirish
			
			dynasty_title_names = no
			used_for_dynasty_names = no
			mercenary = yes
			title = "CAPTAIN"
			foa = "CAPTAIN_FOA"

			landless = yes
			primary = yes
			independent = yes

			mercenary_type = d_irish_corsairs_composition

			strength_growth_per_century = 0.5
		}

### HOLY ORDERS ###

		d_defenders_of_the_gods = {
			color={ 40 180 60 }
			color2={ 255 255 255 }
			
			capital = 32 # Viroconium
			
			# Hire Trigger
			allow = {
				conditional_tooltip = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							is_alternate_start = yes
						}
					}
					religion = briton_pagan
					NOR = {
						is_ingvaeonic_culture_trigger = yes
						is_frankish_culture_trigger = yes
					}
				}
			}
